title: Topic 002 Question 020
body: You need to build a solution that will use optical character recognition (OCR) to scan sensitive documents by using the Computer Vision API. The solution must
NOT be deployed to the public cloud.
options: Build an on-premises web app to query the Computer Vision endpoint.
Host the Computer Vision endpoint in a container on an on-premises server.
Host an exported Open Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) model on an on-premises server.
Build an Azure web app to query the Computer Vision endpoint.
